name: Who asked for help
description:
Who asked for help ?

How to play:

  1. Use "WASD" to move around. Walk into the people who ask for help.
  2. Your health bar will slowly deplete over time if you do no help people. 
  3. Stay away from the angry mob.
  4. Help a certain amount of people before the timer hits Zero failing to do so would result  in a failed game.

Summary

In this short game, you will take control of a demigod who needs to help people to stay alive. 

There are people of a certain forbidden village who will ask for your help. You must walk up to them and all their problems will be solved. However an angry mob is after you constantly chasing after you every time you help someone.

If you don't help people your health/ energy will slowly deplete and you will fail the game. Helping people, helps you stay alive.  Every time the angry mob attacks you, you will lose more health.

After you help a certain number of people a little part of the main characters story gets revealed.

I wanted to recreate the Vampire Souls mechanic of constantly generating the environment and spawning enemies. How ever I did not want to implement a mechanic where you use power ups to destroy people. 

I wanted to use this mechanic to create a fast paced mini story game which would even fit on a small ZINE.
